set(THIS_PROJECT freetype)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set (SourceGroup_Configuration
	cry_ftmodule.h
	cry_ftoption.h
)
source_group("Configuration" FILES ${SourceGroup_Configuration})


set (SourceGroup_Root
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/autofit/autofit.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/base/ftbase.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/base/ftbbox.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/base/ftbitmap.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/base/ftglyph.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/base/ftinit.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/base/ftmm.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/base/ftsystem.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/base/ftwinfnt.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/cache/ftcache.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/psaux/psaux.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/pshinter/pshinter.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/raster/raster.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/sfnt/sfnt.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/smooth/smooth.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/truetype/truetype.c
	../../SDKs/freetype/src/winfonts/winfnt.c
)


# Support unity build with uber files
set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_Configuration} ${SourceGroup_Root}  )


set (SOURCES
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST

ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DFT_CONFIG_OPTIONS_H="cry_ftoption.h")
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DFT_CONFIG_MODULES_H="cry_ftmodule.h")
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DFT2_BUILD_LIBRARY)

include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )
include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/freetype/include )

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} STATIC ${SOURCES})

#USE_MSVC_PRECOMPILED_HEADER( ${THIS_PROJECT} "StdAfx.h" "StdAfx.cpp" )

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
